body: - update the workflow to use package: `bwa-mem-aligner.v0.2.0` and `bam-merge-sort-markdup.v0.2.0`, which have fixes for the usage of `temp_dir` to resolve abnormal resume issue

name: dna-seq-alignment.v1.9.0
body:
* Release `dna-seq-alignment.v1.9.0` (c08bf115c8468a5d4312f365fe3108116fc1cc53)
* Package `dna-seq-alignment.v1.9.0.tar.gz` (sha256: `20a4c189997c8e93320f19f129571ed8d7d48b96ac24717edd247048c4168787`)

* updated to `payload-gen-dna-alignment@0.5.0`, which is needed by ARGO SV working group to run WGS alignment job on HPC environment

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0), [0.5.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.5.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher

name: dna-seq-alignment.v1.8.1
body:
* Release `dna-seq-alignment.v1.8.1` (f82a96701a1f986f04ab8c46ebf5e3d11d36ebd7)
* Package `dna-seq-alignment.v1.8.1.tar.gz` (sha256: `c6a0c79a86849b1a5a79db7585417cf1d410d2e18f89528c9e6f964c7185c49a`)

* updated to `payload-gen-dna-alignment@0.4.0` and `payload-gen-dna-seq-qc@0.6.0` WFPM packages with support for new `data_subtypes` and adjusted `dataType`
* updated to `song-score-download@2.6.2` and `song-score-upload@2.6.1`

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0), [0.5.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.5.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher

name: dna-seq-alignment.v1.8.0
body:
* Release `dna-seq-alignment.v1.8.0` (d2fb7aff0cc92d4606eefa0bd857fe170074d366)
* Package `dna-seq-alignment.v1.8.0.tar.gz` (sha256: `b3f1a76d5c037efb7ac061c7b051ca16b5364e51567de5539195406e86fdacdd`)

* switched to use `song-score-download@2.6.1` that supports retry on song/score temporary failures
* switched to use `song-score-upload@2.6.0` that supports retry on song/score temporary failures

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0), [0.5.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.5.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher

name: dna-seq-alignment.v1.7.0
body:
* Release `dna-seq-alignment.v1.7.0` (cf0c70302320aea08a8389272f0304c22ac8cb27)
* Package `dna-seq-alignment.v1.7.0.tar.gz` (sha256: `7fe6c84aff28847c42d1f331c380f163588ea2252aad60311a1bbb2681b04ac3`)

* the alignment workflow has been converted to be a [WFPM](https://github.com/icgc-argo/wfpm)-compatible workflow package
* now CI testing is done by GitHub Actions
* added a dependent `payload-gen-seq-experiment@0.4.0` package to accept metadata in TSV files, a feature needed by the ARGO WGs for their benchmarking work
* added test to cover the above new feature
* no change to any core algorithms

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0), [0.5.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.5.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.10.0](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.10.0) or higher

name: dna-seq-alignment.v1.6.1
body:
* Release `dna-seq-alignment.v1.6.1` (b1cb82015be36a0bbfa61c22aced84c6625ea56f)
* Package `dna-seq-alignment.v1.6.1.tar.gz` (sha256: `2a5fa87fc86ba79f0398c7f1a718abf1dc6822207624c3f7623973a7b35d9eb8`)

name: dna-seq-alignment.v1.6.0
body:
* Release `dna-seq-alignment.v1.6.0` (9e4cbdc84cda0163c501b7961e569e4c37331644)
* Package `dna-seq-alignment.v1.6.0.tar.gz` (sha256: `0060c54c115f0ead1d48b63871a807d979ddba9abca5bdd7795901abd087ef46`)

- update oxog tool by adding options to handle `paired-end` and `single-end` reads differently
- add tool `metadata-parser`  and test cases

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0), [0.5.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.5.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher

* improvement of local mode, it now requires `params.publish_dir` to be provided and does cleanup as well
* update `payload-gen-dna-seq-qc` to 0.5.3.0 which provide `ps` command in docker, which is needed for `-with-trace` and `-with-report`

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0), [0.5.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.5.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher
* added `params.publish_dir`, when provided outputs of aligned seq and metadata will be copied over to it at the completion of the workflow

- add fix to handle nan oxoQ score
- compress bam output format

* update payload-gen-dna-alignment to `0.3.2.0` which ensures all file names use the same date string

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher

* updated components: `seq-data-to-lane-bam`, `bwa-mem-aligner` and `payload-gen-dna-seq-qc`
* able to handle multiple input BAMs
* able to handle different input BAMs containing read group with same ID
* added tests for the above scenarios

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher

* update to SONG/SCORE utils [2.3.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/nextflow-data-processing-utility-tools/releases/tag/2.3.0)
* enable DSL2: `nextflow.preview.dsl = 2` to `nextflow.enable.dsl = 2`

Note: 
1. compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0)
2. requires [Nextflow 20.07.1](https://github.com/nextflow-io/nextflow/releases/tag/v20.07.1) or higher

* updated payload generation modules to include a new field `session_id` in SONG metadata
* introduced dependencies among some potential parallel tasks so that they run sequentially, this is to reduce disk IO bottleneck during concurrent reads from very large files (#47)

Note: compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.4.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.4.0)

* updated payload gen tools to sync with harmonized SONG schemas which support well defined data categories and data types
* updated utils module to 1.1.5
* added default params, especially for second level objects, this can also serves as documentation
* added support for local mode which is greatly useful for testing
* added test that can be run on Travis without SONG/SCORE dependecies

Note: compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.3.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.3.0)

* update to song-score-util `1.1.1` with song-client `4.2.1`
* improved song-submit error handling
* support `experimental_strategy` in `bwa-mem-aligner`

Note: compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.2.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.2.0)

* update `payload-gen-dna-alignment` and `payload-gen-dna-seq-qc` with SONG payload schema change
* update `score-client` docker image to `5.0.0`

Note: compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.2.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.2.0)

* update with song-client docker image 4.2.0 that supports non-root user

Note: compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.1.1](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.1.1), [0.1.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.1.0)

* update payload-gen-dna-seq-qc which sanitizes lane bam qc metrics file name with `:` converts to` _`, but also avoids possible file name collision as a result of the conversion

Note: compatible *argo-metadata-schema* versions: [0.1.1](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.1.1), [0.1.0](https://github.com/icgc-argo/argo-metadata-schemas/releases/tag/0.1.0)

* updated output file naming conventions
* add support for optional `tempdir` param for aligner and mkdup tools, this enables the possibility to use local scratch storage for large temporatory files
* pickup updated song/score modules that hide api tokens

* update `seq-data-to-lane-bam` and `bwa-mem-aligner` to add support allowing read group id in BAM header being different than the desired read group id in the final aligned seq
* fix a corner case where total bases could be `0` when running OxoG metric collection on small intervals
* update bwa-mem to `0.1.7.1` which gets read group ID from input lane bam header instead of relies on file name which is not reliable due to converion of special chars (eg `:`)

Major tasks performed in the pipeline:
* download input sequencing metadata/data from `SONG/SCORE`
* preprocess input sequencing reads (in `FASTQ` or `BAM`) into lane level (aka read group level) `BAM`
* collect `CollectQualityYieldMetrics` using `Picard` tool for read group
* perform `BWA-MEM` alignment against `GRCh38` reference genome in parallel for each lane `BAM`
* merge and markduplicate aligned lane `BAM`, produce coordinate-sorted `CRAM/CRAI` and `duplicates_metrics`
* collect alignment QC metrics using `samtools stats` for aligned seq
* collect `CollectOxoGMetrics` using `GATK` for aligned seq and calculate `OxoQ` score
* generate `SONG` metadata for aligned seq and upload them to `SONG/SCORE`
* generate `SONG` metadata for all collected `qc_metrics` and upload them to `SONG/SCORE`
* cleanup intermediate files produced by the above steps

* support parallel execution of oxog metrics collection task
* cleanupWorkdir process becomes independent tool, can be used in other pipelines
* update to use safer cleanupWorkdir process with safeguard against removing non-workdir files
